item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Wow, I had no idea you hated Belly. Amusing. There's a bit of Throwing Muses in TJF as well. Between The Pains of Being Pure At Heart and The Joy Formidable I feel like a freshman in college all over again. If this is mid-life crisis, I'm enjoying it.
item.content:encoded: Wow, I had no idea you hated Belly. Amusing. There’s a bit of Throwing Muses in TJF as well. Between The Pains of Being Pure At Heart and The Joy Formidable I feel like a freshman in college all over again. If this is mid-life crisis, I’m enjoying it.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: TJF destroys belly. blech. tonya donelly should never have left throwing muses. i am really digging this, though.
item.content:encoded: TJF destroys belly. blech. tonya donelly should never have left throwing muses. i am really digging this, though.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-1599">vance</a>.
There's a tinge of Blonde Redhead and a hearkening back to the power pop of the early '90s that I really like, but their sound is fresh and addictive.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to vance.

There’s a tinge of Blonde Redhead and a hearkening back to the power pop of the early ’90s that I really like, but their sound is fresh and addictive.

item.title: By: vance
item.dc:creator: vance
item.description: love the sound TJF make with "Whirring" & "The Greatest light is the Greatest shade" real standouts live. Passion, soul & energy.
item.content:encoded: love the sound TJF make with “Whirring” & “The Greatest light is the Greatest shade” real standouts live. Passion, soul & energy.
